dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of use of trademarked terms on website hosted by ThePlanet.com Interne
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page http://seductiontimes.com/blog/ any
of the material that you claim is being infringed as of 10:12:32 a.m.
(GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Sunday, February 19, 2006 3:03 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; info@learntheskills.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of use of trademarked terms on website hosted
by ThePlanet.com Internet Services]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Notice of use of trademarked terms on website hosted
by ThePlanet.com Internet Services
Date:         Fri, 17 Feb 2006 20:56:48 -0800 (PST)
From:         LTS Info <info@learntheskills.com>
Reply-To:         info@learntheskills.com
To:         abuse@theplanet.com
CC:         info@learntheskills.com



Dear Hostmaster,

On the website seductiontimes.com which is hosted by your service, we have
noticed through recently initiated automated usage checks the use terms
trademarked or copyrighted by our company, Learn The Skills Corp (parent
company of the website www.fastseduction.com).

The trademark and property usage checks are related to "Fast Seduction 101",
"FastSeduction.com", "FastSeduction", "Fast Seduction", "FS101", etc, and
various trademarks and copyrights associated with those terms or content
associated with those terms.

Here are the URL(s) we have found that conflict with some or all of these
trademarks and copyrights:

http://seductiontimes.com/blog/

We appreciate your cooperation in this regard, and look forward to your
response indicating that you have contacted them and passed on our request
to have the conflicting terms and usages removed.  We will continue our
automated checks so in the event that we do not hear back from you we will
be forced to contact you again.

Regards,

Rey
Learn The Skills Corp.
CEO
tokyopua@fastseduction.com <mailto:tokyopua@fastseduction.com>
info@learnthesills.com <mailto:info@learnthesills.com>

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFD+Nz5vK/XpJs6oyURAi5rAJ9nbV+AhZKSVp2inzKCxHefrJVDzACfVJnK
uI6UOsKDSXAOVugq4izXg10=
=f//x
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
